articles.description: Shoaib Bashir's six-wicket haul breaks Zimbabwe's feisty resistance and leads England to victory by an innings and 45 runs inside three days of the one-off Test.
articles.title: England v Zimbabwe: Shoaib Bashir takes six wickets to seal huge win

articles.description: Bordeaux's mix of backline glitter and forward grit proves too much for Northampton in the Champions Cup final in Cardiff.
articles.title: Northampton 20-28 Bordeaux-Begles - Saints beaten in Champions Cup final

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris snatched pole position for the Monaco Grand Prix from local hero Charles Leclerc's Ferrari with the final lap of qualifying.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix 2025: Norris snatches pole from Leclerc

articles.description: "There are discussions" over Cristiano Ronaldo playing at the Club World Cup despite his current club not qualifying, says Fifa president Gianni Infantino.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo 'could play' in 2025 Club World Cup, says Fifa president Gianni Infantino

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim tells winger Alejandro Garnacho he will be allowed to join a new club this summer.
articles.title: Manchester United: Alejandro Garnacho told he can leave by head coach Ruben Amorim

articles.description: Novak Djokovic makes another bit of tennis history as he clinches his 100th ATP singles title with a battling victory over Hubert Hurkacz in Geneva.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic: Veteran wins 100th ATP Tour title with victory over Hubert Hurkacz at Geneva Open

articles.description: Shubman Gill is appointed Test captain of the India men's team before their tour of England, replacing Rohit Sharma after he retired from the format.
articles.title: India in England: Shubman Gill named India men's new Test captain

articles.description: Erik ten Hag is on the brink of agreeing a deal to replace Xabi Alonso as manager of German club Bayer Leverkusen.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Bayer Leverkusen set to appoint former Manchester United boss as Xabi Alonso replacement
